skills.name: Fire Hurricane
skills.description: Attacks the enemy 3 times with a whirling storm of fire. Stuns the enemy for 1 turn with a 20% chance.

skills.name: Double Arrow
skills.description: Shoots two arrows to attack a target enemy and a random enemy. Stuns the enemy if both arrows hit the same target.
